ssnapinterface 0.0.1
  • Reference

Reference

Read

Read in SSNAP data exported from the website as CSV files.

read_ssnap_csv()

Load SSNAP data from CSV file into memory

Bitfields

Groups of non-exclusive booleans are stored for efficiency as integers. Each bit for each field is named in these vectors.

tpa_no_but

Bit-field flags for 'No But' reasons for not thrombolysing a patient

tpa_complications

Bit-field flags for recording complications from thrombolysing a patient

Lookup functions

Some fields are values which we want to ‘look up’ in related tables later.

teamcode_to_number()

Converts team codes into numbers

Internal functions

These are used within the code but are not exported; you only need to know how they work if you are modifying SSNAPInterface.

internal_add_clock_start_and_stop

Add fields needed to calculate cohorts from the population

internal_convert_tpa_complications_to_bitfields

(internal) quos to convert thrombolysis complications from logicals to a bitfield

internal_convert_tpa_no_but_to_bitfields

(internal) quos to convert 'Thrombolysis No Buts' from logicals to a bitfield

internal_load_csv()

(internal) Load the CSV file of SSNAP data

internal_simplify_booleans

(internal) Simplify booleans

internal_simplify_dates

(internal) Clean date fields in the raw CSV.

In progress / unsafe functions

Functions in this category are recognised as being important. However they haven’t been fully tested, or their API or precise role within the code hasn’t been determined so should not be part of the fixed code. They start with the name “unsafe” until they are more complete and/or tested.

unsafe_convert_ethnicity_codes()

Convert ethnicity codes to UK-wide descriptions

unsafe_select_ssnap_csv_fields()

Choose CSV columns given list of SSNAP column names

Contents

  • Read
  • Bitfields
  • Lookup functions
  • Internal functions
  • In progress / unsafe functions
